title: When someone says "Support pref" in ranked.

replies.body: For some reason I'm seeing more supports lately and I actually have to compete for it...
wow, i rarely see two people competing for supp, wow.
i had a whole team of support mains in ranked. first pick op
and then you see a sion, and you cry because you have no damage and you can't kill him
don't you mean the sion is crying because he will never touch kalista the whole game.

Sooooooooo glad Morgana's pool doesn't do damage.
Or Kalista.
Or AP Nautilus.
AP NAUT, SAVAGE. But seriously when I say you have no damage, I meant you had low damage.
haha true

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T02:15:32.784+0000)
>
> For some reason I'm seeing more supports lately and I actually have to compete for it...

The higher you go the more you have to fight for it
That could explain it; last season I couldn't break into Silver 1, and this time I'm Gold and actually had an ally in his D5 promos.
Really? I almost never have to fight for support xD

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T02:15:32.784+0000)
>
> For some reason I'm seeing more supports lately and I actually have to compete for it...

I KNOW RIGHT!

I kind of became a Taric main because i always got forced into support role but now I've had to fight for that shit. not sure if I'm proud or scared.
"only vel koz support tho, I cant play anybody else"

> [{quoted}](name=DWT12345,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-29T02:38:16.160+0000)
>
> "only vel koz support tho, I cant play anybody else"

Vel'koz "support"

As someone who mains Vel'Koz and frequently plays him support...

I can confirm Vel'Koz "support" is basically just "Vel'Koz with Sightstone"
hehehe, same with brand "support" (I only seen it, not done it). funny stuff

> [{quoted}](name=BetaDude40,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-07-29T14:24:53.426+0000)
>
> As someone who mains Vel'Koz and frequently plays him support...
> 
> I can confirm Vel'Koz "support" is basically just "Vel'Koz with Sightstone"

Vel'koz support gets sightstone?!?!?

MFW i literally 1shotted the enemy adc as velkoz at level 6, my adc didn't have time to take the assist.
I wrote in all chat "If I take sighstone I'm the support, right?"

Well, he can be countered by the almighty dive comps (Thresh, Leona, Blitz, Alistar and the like) and he is a very squishy champion in general.

But every game, I say to my ADC "when I hit 6, I do not care how far ahead or behind we are. I do not care if you have less farm than them. But I will ult, and you will go in, and we will get a double kill [emphasis on _WE_, because I don't even know who's getting the kills when I ult] and we will win. Okay?"

It works most of the time, anyway.
The actualy scary part is that you are immobile while ulting, if you aren't in a safe spot when you start, you might die faster than they do xD
Upvoted 'cause not bullshitting.
"trust me guys it works. i got a double on some bots last game and i only died 17 times :D"

Velkoz support is actually pretty good. Thing is, a lot of midlaners take him bot thinking they can "support" with him, and don't change their build accordingly. He is though, played well, a really good kill lane/ poke support.
I prefer Xerath for harass.
at least it isn't Katarina support :c
I had a katarina and shaco bot lane on my team... I went into the game just thinking oh kat is gonna ks like hell... Mind blown... Kat only had assists and shaco was fed as hell...

> [{quoted}](name=DWT12345,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-29T02:38:16.160+0000)
>
> "only vel koz support tho, I cant play anybody else"

Fiora sup inc.

Lmao!

Everytime I play ranked...A bunch of people want supp. I'm like noooo so I try to ADC. (but I have only played a few ranked games)

I have terrible luck.

I really want something similar to team builder for ranked.
Riot is working on teambuilder draft. They like it too, it if works out, it will be a part of ranked

> [{quoted}](name=Cynth0114,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-07-29T15:28:50.322+0000)
>
> Riot is working on teambuilder draft. They like it too, it if works out, it will be a part of ranked

That sounds so magical. O:
yus
they said hopefully season 6
I don't know what's so special about it. I see support mains (other than me) in roughly half my games.

> [{quoted}](name=Hrud,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-29T07:22:44.378+0000)
>
> I don't know what's so special about it. I see support mains (other than me) in roughly half my games.

AKA non support players see support players in just less than half their games while they're always fighting over their positions. The difference there is pretty big xD

> [{quoted}](name=Hrud,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8V7B2bEu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-29T07:22:44.378+0000)
>
> I don't know what's so special about it. I see support mains (other than me) in roughly half my games.

I think the higher up you go in rank, the more likely you are to see a fellow support main.

When I was bronze, I was guaranteed my support role. Now that I'm silver (fluctuating between V and III) I see other support mains more frequently.

I love how I say "Support Pref" and everyone's like

http://i.imgur.com/JNLWq1l.jpg[/img]

And I'm like

http://i.imgur.com/XvzgYwN.jpg[/img]

If I played ranked I'd be so popular 

<.<
Same, but I hate abusive adc's and take a wild guess what game mode they tend to play.
Is it Draft Dominion? :^)
I think it's draft ARAM

I like to support:

Reasons:

1) It is 90% a guaranteed position at my level of play, so might as well main it (easy way to get main role)

2) you usually do not have to fight with someone for your role

3) your team is usually happier that none of them have to take that role

4) I (for some unexplained reason) get enjoyment out of helping people

5) It trains you how to ward better (grant it you can learn to ward in other lanes, but in this role you are more forced to ward than other lanes)

6) you have a duo lane (if your lane goes south, you are not viewed as the sole culprit; if it does well and you knew your adc was crappy, you get the satisfaction you were able to make that scrub seem as if they knew what they were doing ;)     

7) you do not have to worry about the pressure of a carry role (mind you, that I do miss out on the perceived glory of the carry roles, but then again I also miss out on the infinite rage given to carry roles who got crapped on in game :)

8) you only have to wait 2 seconds for this position in team-builder

9) you get the enjoyment of denying enemy kills and then indirectly killing them by doing so (oh so many times I have stopped them... sooo much entertainment)

Grant it, I enjoy doing other roles as well (I do enjoy a good {{champion:27}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:115}} once in a while, but basically guaranteeing your main role is just too much to pass up! Also, don't look at it as "I got stuck into placing wards for this stupid adc;" make your goal as, "can I make my adc crush the enemy bot lane and can I save him in clutch situations." If you change your perspective, the role can be more fun. Also... DO NOT THINK BECAUSE SOMEONE MAINS SUPPORT THAT THEY ARE A WOMAN!!! ARRRRGHHHHHHH!!! (ohhhh, the profiling)

P.S. I am still classified to many of you as a scrub, thus you may treat whatever I say in whatever way you want to. I have not tried ranked yet still being relatively new to the game and am waiting for more experience, BUT I am trying to learn as much as possible about it. Besides, there are people still under 30 who post stuff here, so why not!
You're an American hero. I salute you.

Every time someone says "please let me support" I'm just like 
"oh darn I wanted to support soooo bad but I guess I'll let you have it, fam ;)"
But in my head I'm just blown the fuck away that anyone wants to support in a ranked game. I'd sooner take Lulu mid or top to provide CC and buffs to the team than support a feeding ADC and have no way to carry the game.
Welp, that's me in almost every ranked queue
then they lock in rengar support

I had a game earlier this morning where THREE WHOLE PEOPLE fought over support like it was the end of the world if they didn't get it.
And then there's teambuilder :(
now if only I played ranked. ;p
Nope... the tards all jump for Top. {{champion:75}} I want no responsibilities until my balls swell with farm.
